translation.en: Are you gonna throw up? Do you want me to pull over?

translation.en: I mean, every woman's body is different, right?
Oh, yeah? What do you know about women's bodies?

-Wir sind auf halbem Weg nach San Diego. -Ich weiß.

translation.en: [sighs] It's just been hard to know for sure.
Dad must think I'm an idiot.
translation.de: Dad hält mich für eine Idiotin.

translation.en: [sighs] Look, Beck, I know it's not in your nature to put yourself first,
translation.de: Beck, es ist zwar nicht deine Art, zuerst an dich zu denken,

translation.en: but in this case, I don't think you should take Mom and Dad's feelings into account.
translation.de: aber du solltest keine Rücksicht auf Mom und Dad nehmen.

translation.en: I don't think you should take my feelings into account.
I don't think you should even take the baby's needs into account. Okay?
translation.de: Du solltest nicht mal auf das Baby Rücksicht nehmen. Ok?

translation.en: Guess I'll have another 1,500 miles to decide, right?
translation.de: Mir bleiben 2.400 Kilometer, um mich zu entscheiden, nicht?

translation.en: -Let's just get back on the road and... -[boy] Help!
-...not worry about any of this. -Did you hear that?
Sounds like he's really in trouble.
[boy] I've been trying to get to the road, -but I can't find it! -[sighs]
translation.de: Ich finde nicht zur Straße zurück!

translation.en: Careful. Don't slide down into that ditch.
Watch your arm. I'm gonna pull this thing off the side of the road.
translation.de: Vorsicht mit deinem Arm. Ich parke die Karre.

translation.en: Hey, kid, can you hear me?
I've been stuck in here for days!
translation.de: Ich sitze seit Tagen hier fest.

translation.en: There's a woman in there with him. She's being weird.
translation.de: Da ist eine Frau bei ihm. Sie verhält sich komisch.

translation.en: Kid, you're right next to us. Can you see the road?
translation.de: Wir sind ganz in der Nähe. Siehst du die Straße?

translation.en: -[Tobin] Yes! Please hurry! -[voice recording] Emergency services.
-Please stay on the line. -[Tobin] I'm tired!
[Cal] Okay, Tobin, listen to me. Just sit tight. We're gonna come to you.
translation.de: Ok, Tobin, hör zu. Bleib, wo du bist. Wir kommen zu dir.
Hi. Ich bin an der Route 400.

translation.en: [Becky] I don't know the town name, but there's a kid lost in the grass.
translation.de: Ich kenne den Ortsnamen nicht. Ein Junge hat sich im Grasfeld verirrt.

translation.en: I lost the 911 chick. Is your phone working?
translation.de: Ich habe keinen Empfang. Funktioniert dein Handy?

translation.en: No, I left my phone in the car.
translation.de: Nein, mein Handy ist im Auto.

translation.en: Please, keep coming. I can't find you.
translation.de: Bitte, sucht nach mir. Ich finde euch nicht.

translation.en: Kid, you sound like you're headed for Nebraska. Stay still!
translation.de: Kleiner, willst du etwa nach Nebraska? Bleib stehen!

translation.en: I don't care how scared you are, don't move. Let us come to you.
translation.de: Auch wenn du Angst hast, bleib, wo du bist. Wir kommen zu dir.

translation.en: Becky, where the hell are you?
translation.de: Becky, wo zum Teufel bist du?

translation.en: Something's not right about this. I think we should head back to the road.
translation.de: Hier stimmt etwas nicht. Wir sollten zurück zur Straße.

translation.en: What about the kid and his mom?
translation.de: Und der Junge und seine Mom?

translation.en: Let's just get back together first.
I'll keep talking and you work your way back towards me, okay?
translation.de: Ich rede weiter und du folgst meiner Stimme, ok?

translation.en: [Becky] What do you talk about when you're lost in a field?
translation.de: Was redet man in so einer Situation?

translation.en: [Cal] Thousands of miles of gabbing, and you can't think of anything to say?

translation.en: There once was a guy named McSweeney
Who spilled some gin on his weenie
translation.de: der lief ihm am Kinn dahin.

translation.en: Just to be couth, he added vermouth And slipped his girl a martini
translation.de: Der tat gut, doch er fügte Wermut hinzu, und schwups war's ein Martini."

translation.en: Aah! Stop, stop. I overshot you somehow.
[Becky] Cal, quit fucking around. This isn't funny.
translation.de: Cal, hör damit auf. Das ist nicht witzig.

translation.en: You're right, there's something wrong here.
translation.de: Du hast recht, hier stimmt was nicht.

translation.en: All right, let's just do this.
On the count of three, we both jump with our hands raised in the air.
translation.de: Auf drei springen wir mit erhobenen Händen hoch.

translation.en: [Becky] Yeah, of course I can jump. What do you think?
translation.de: Ja, natürlich. Was denkst du denn?

translation.en: I think you're gonna have a baby this summer, that's what I think.
translation.de: Dass du bald ein Baby kriegst, das denke ich.

translation.en: [Becky] Yeah. Yeah, you did. You must have! You still are.

translation.en: I'm not. I swear I'm not.
Forget it. Let's just do this.
This is nuts! This is fucking nuts!
[Becky] Cal? Are you okay? What is it?
translation.de: Cal? Geht es dir gut? Was ist los?

translation.en: I'm getting a little freaked out here.
translation.de: Ich drehe langsam ein wenig durch.

translation.en: [groans] We're gonna get out of here.
We just need to keep our heads.
[Cal] Beck, just stay where you are, okay? Don't move.
translation.de: Beck, bleib wo du bist, ok? Nicht bewegen.

translation.en: It's okay, Cal. This is Tobin's daddy.
translation.de: Schon gut, Cal. Ich bin Tobins Daddy.

translation.en: If you wanna get out of here, come with me.
translation.de: Wenn du hier raus willst, folge mir.

translation.en: If you could get out, why are you still in?
translation.de: Du kennst den Weg, bist aber noch hier?

translation.en: I'm looking for my boy and my wife. They're lost in here, too.
translation.de: Ich suche meinen Sohn und meine Frau. Sie sind auch hier drin.

translation.en: Look, it's gonna be dark soon. We should stick together.
translation.de: Es ist bald dunkel. Wir sollten zusammenbleiben.

translation.en: I understand. You don't know me from Adam.
translation.de: Ich verstehe. Du kennst mich nicht.

translation.en: Ross Humbolt's the name. Real estate's the game. [chuckles]
translation.de: Ross Humbolt ist mein Name. Immobilienbranche.

translation.en: Not like walking a straight line, though. Nothing is around here.
translation.de: Das wird kein Kinderspiel. Aber das ist hier nichts.

translation.en: Just follow me, but stay close. Whatever you do, don't lose sight of me, okay?
translation.de: Bleib dicht bei mir. Verliere mich keinesfalls aus den Augen.

translation.en: Hang tight, Cal. We're coming for ya.
But it's easier once they're dead.
translation.de: Es ist einfacher, wenn sie tot sind.

translation.en: The field doesn't move dead things around.
translation.de: Das Feld bewegt keine toten Dinge.

translation.en: did you lure us in here?
How long have you been in here?

translation.en: How do you know she's my sister?
translation.de: Woher weißt du, wer sie ist?

translation.en: The rock teaches you to hear the tall grass.

translation.en: you must know where she is.
I can find out for you.
I can do better than that.
Do you wanna check on her?
I remember when Natalie was pregnant.
Enjoy your baby, because it goes fast.

The sooner we get to them, the better.

Wow, das fühlt sich gut an.

moves in late tonight into the morning.

and that helps to kind of set the stage for some drizzle, possibly,

translation.en: across especially eastern and southeastern counties for your Tuesday.
translation.de: in den östlichen und südöstlichen Countys am Dienstag.

translation.en: Considering this time of year, abnormally cool.
The people who are stuck in here.
But they're not connected to us, so... doesn't matter.

How do you know my name? You're looking for Becky.

translation.en: It makes them easier to find.
[sobbing] Oh, my God. Oh, my God, oh, my...
[woman] Well, we don't know whose car it is...
-Hello! -[Ross] Tobin, keep an eye on Freddy.
What, you... you don't remember me now?

translation.en: Over there, Mommy. Do you hear him?

translation.en: -Get out! Get somebody. -We'll close when I get back next week.

Don't back out of escrow. -You're not overpaying. -Tobin! Damn it!

translation.en: [Ross] Toby, don't worry about Freddy. Just come back to us.

translation.en: If you're still outside the grass, don't come back in here!

translation.de: Tobin Humbolt, hör auf deine Mutter! Komm zurück!

translation.en: [Natalie] Honey, can you see him? -Where is he? -[Tobin] Over here!
-[Ross] Sounds like he's in front of us. -Are you Tobin's dad?
[Ross] Yeah. Who are you? What's going on?

translation.en: -Don't come in here! -[Ross] Little late for that, buddy.

translation.en: That guy, though, I'm not so sure about.

translation.en: Toby, don't let that man get near you, okay? Don't talk to him. If you see him, you run.

translation.en: Okay. Okay, Rossy boy. Hold it together.

translation.en: Stay positive. That's what's gonna get you out of this.

translation.en: It's gonna get you out of this.
"Mind that's light sells right." Right? "The mind that's light sells right."

Fuck. This fucking kid. Fucking kid.

-I've been trying to get to the road... -[Cal sighs] ...but I can't find it!

There once was a man named McSweeney

And that's a dirty rhyme, not for kids.

translation.en: What the fuck is going on?
translation.de: Was zum Teufel ist hier los?

translation.en: Name one thing in here that does.
So, explain to us again how you got here.
translation.de: Erkläre uns noch mal, wie du herkamst.

translation.en: You must have been right on our asses the whole way.

translation.en: Oh, no, no. I came after.
you didn't show up in San Diego.
translation.de: Ihr wart nicht in San Diego.

translation.en: We just left two days ago.
translation.de: Wir sind vor zwei Tagen losgefahren.

translation.en: No, it was longer than that. It was more like... two months.
translation.de: Nein, das ist länger her, wohl eher... zwei Monate.

translation.en: Now, that really doesn't make any sense.
translation.de: Das ergibt nun wirklich keinen Sinn.

translation.en: I think we have to focus on how the hell we get out.

translation.en: Well, I'm not making Becky blindly walk through Wonderland anymore.
translation.de: Becky kann nicht weiter durchs Wunderland irren.

translation.en: -We need some kind of plan. -Well, we can't just sit here.
translation.de: -Ein Plan muss her. -Wir müssen was tun.

translation.en: -I think we have to get moving. -[Becky] Yeah.
No, I agree. Let's just go.
The point is I don't want to stay here.
Do you see anything other than grass?
translation.de: Siehst du etwas anderes als Gras?
Es ist ein Gebäude, glaube ich.

translation.en: No, I can't tell. It's too far away.
translation.de: Ich erkenne es nicht. Es ist zu weit weg.

translation.en: [Cal] So, you saw our car at the church and you didn't call anybody?
translation.de: Du hast unser Auto an der Kirche gesehen und niemanden angerufen?

translation.en: I don't suppose you, um, told anyone where you were headed, did you?
translation.de: Du hast niemandem gesagt, wo du hinwolltest, oder?

translation.en: Not that it'll make much difference.

translation.de: Eure Eltern sind krank vor Sorge.

translation.en: What could they do? You ask me, I don't think anyone's coming.

translation.en: everyone thought I was crazy for trying.
Yeah. It's been a while since I checked.
Didn't wanna wait to find out.
Ginny is what I'm calling her.
For now, anyways, after my great aunt Virginia.

translation.en: Lively is the word for it.
[Becky over phone] Don't let Cal hurt Travis!
Or else we're gonna keep making the same mistake!

Hey! Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!
-Daddy! -Toby! Oh, thank God. Toby, thank God! Oh!

translation.en: Hey, don't worry. Your mother, she's out there.
translation.de: Keine Sorge. Deine Mom ist da draußen.

translation.en: We're gonna find her, and then we're leaving.

translation.en: Yeah, I got to the road, but I wasn't gonna leave without my family.

translation.en: Well, it's not a straight line. I can say that much.

translation.en: -Which way were you headed? -Towards that building.
[Travis] All right, come on. Up on my shoulders, Tobin.
[Ross] That's the way things work around here.
translation.de: So läuft es hier nun mal.

translation.en: But I got the golden ticket, for any takers.
translation.de: Aber ich kenne den Weg. Freiwillige vor.

translation.en: Let me guess. Lead singer in a band?
translation.de: Lass mich raten. Sänger in einer Band?

translation.en: Four-piece, with a weekly gig at the local?
I'm a good judge of people. You gotta be, in my field.
translation.de: Ich bin Menschenkenner, ist wichtig in meinem Feld.

translation.en: We were on a little family vacay through the heartland.
translation.de: Wir waren auf Familienreise durch das Herzland.

translation.en: It was going pretty well till we ran into you.
translation.de: Es lief gut, bis wir dich trafen.

translation.en: I'm just giving you a hard time, that's all.
I know it's not your fault.
You know, believe it or not, before I ended up here, before, uh, real estate was my game,
translation.de: Ob ihr es glaubt oder nicht, vor dem Immobiliengeschäft

translation.en: Me and my Gibson and Jesus were gonna rock the world.
translation.de: Ich und meine Gibson und Jesus hätten die Welt erobert.

translation.en: But, you know, got married and had a kid, and...
translation.de: Wie das so ist, dann kam die Heirat, ein Kind...

translation.en: Still, nothin', but nothin' compares to this.
translation.de: Aber nichts von alldem kommt an das hier heran.

translation.en: [Ross] Oh, I think it's a safe bet it's been here
translation.de: Ich wette, die waren schon da,

translation.en: since before the Kiowa hunted on the Osage Cuestas.
translation.de: bevor die Kiowa in den Osage Cuestas jagten.

translation.en: Probably was here before the glaciers came and carried the hills away.
translation.de: Wahrscheinlich war es schon hier, bevor die Gletscher die Hügel wegtrugen.

translation.en: You realize we're in the center of the contiguous United States.
translation.de: Euch ist doch klar, dass wir im Zentrum der Vereinigten Staaten sind.

translation.en: Smack-dab in the middle of the continent.
translation.de: Genau in der Mitte des Kontinents.

translation.en: Ah, hell, I'd hazard this stone...
translation.de: Zum Teufel, ich schätze sogar, dass dieser Stein...

translation.en: is the center of the center.
We didn't come here for a goddamn sightseeing tour.
You were gonna show us the way out.
translation.de: Du solltest uns den Ausweg zeigen.

translation.en: Is there a map on it or something?
translation.de: Ist da... eine Karte oder so was drauf?

translation.en: Just put your hand on it and you'll know.
translation.de: Leg deine Hand drauf, und du wirst es wissen.

translation.en: -Thank God you're all right. -Stay away! Stay away from us!
translation.de: -Zum Glück geht's dir gut. -Bleib weg. Halt dich fern!

translation.en: Whatever he told you, whatever he said to you, he's lying!
translation.de: Was er euch auch erzählt hat, er lügt!

translation.en: What? What are you talking about?
All I know, all I care about, is that we're finally together.
translation.de: Es zählt allein, dass wir endlich zusammen sind.

translation.en: Everything's gonna be all right now, honey.
She was what? Just say it.
translation.de: Was war sie? Sag es einfach.

translation.en: [sobs] I saw her on the ground some ways back.
translation.de: Ich sah sie vorhin am Boden.

translation.en: Mommy's just a little confused right now.
I am not confused. I saw her. I saw her, and you...
translation.de: Ich bin nicht verwirrt. Ich habe sie gesehen. Und du...

translation.en: -How could you even think that? -[groans] We're all in this together.
translation.de: Wie kannst du das denken? Wir stecken da zusammen drin.

translation.en: Look, thanks for your help, mister, but, uh...
translation.de: Danke für die Hilfe, aber ich glaube...

translation.en: I think we're gonna go our own way now...
Do you wanna come with us?
No, just a minute. Just hear me out.
This rock, once you touch it, you'll know.
translation.de: Dieser Fels, wenn ihr ihn berührt, versteht ihr es.

translation.en: I know that sounds like blasphemy, but it's true.
translation.de: Ich weiß, es klingt wie Blasphemie, aber es stimmt.

translation.en: You think this is just chance?
translation.de: Meint ihr, es ist nur Zufall?

translation.en: Folks are brought into the grass for a reason.
translation.de: Wir sind nicht ohne Grund im Gras.

translation.en: We're all here because we've got stuff to work out.
translation.de: Wir sind alle hier, weil wir etwas lernen müssen.

translation.en: And this rock, in its wisdom,
translation.de: Und der Fels brachte in seiner Weisheit

translation.en: brought our two families together to do just that.
translation.de: unsere Familien zusammen, um genau das zu tun.

translation.en: All it's asking for is a little faith.
translation.de: Er verlangt nur ein wenig Vertrauen.

translation.en: Five little fingers on its face and you will be redeemed!
translation.de: Fünf kleine Finger, die ihn berühren, und ihr werdet erlöst!

translation.en: All your sins, all your trespasses, all your regrets will melt away
translation.de: All eure Sünden, Verfehlungen, all euer Bedauern schwindet dahin,

translation.en: and the world will open up like a flower!
translation.de: und die Welt öffnet sich wie eine Blume!

translation.en: You gotta trust me on this.
I think you should let her go.
Look, you don't have the advantage here.
If you think I was doing the soft sell because I was afraid of going the other way,
translation.de: Wenn ihr meint, mir bliebe nur die weiche Verkaufstaktik,

translation.en: well, you got another think comin'.
It's better that you come to the rock on your own.
translation.de: Ihr kommt besser von allein zum Fels.

translation.en: Open your heart to it, like I did.
translation.de: Öffnet ihm eure Herzen, so wie ich.

translation.en: Now, what I really wanna know...
is how did you get here?
Because the rock wouldn't let you find us unless it wanted you to.
translation.de: Du würdest uns nicht finden, wenn der Fels es nicht wollte.
Außer, es geht gar nicht um dich.

translation.en: When you touch that rock, you'll know everything I know.
translation.de: Wenn du den Fels berührst, wirst du alles wissen, was ich weiß.

translation.en: Everything the grass knows, including how to leave.
translation.de: Alles, was das Gras weiß, auch, wie man rauskommt.
Nur wirst du das nicht wollen.
Ihr könnt der Erlösung nicht entfliehen.

translation.en: He's right, you know? Where are we gonna go?
translation.de: Er hat recht. Wo sollen wir hin?

translation.en: He'll find us. For sure, he'll find us.
[Travis] Listen to me. First thing we have to do is you need to take hold of my hand.
translation.de: Hört zu. Als Erstes müsst ihr mir den Arm einrenken, ok?
-Schon ok, Tobin. -Mein Dad hat recht. Wir sind Gras.

translation.en: We keep dying and coming back.
-I didn't know what to do. -Yeah, you sure didn't.
translation.de: -Ich wusste nicht, was ich tun sollte. -Das ist sicher.

translation.en: Well, we wouldn't be in this mess if it wasn't for you.
translation.de: Ohne dich wären wir gar nicht hier.

translation.en: Okay, blaming each other isn't gonna solve anything.
Well, all indicators are that there's no way to solve this.
translation.de: Es deutet alles darauf hin, dass es keinen Ausweg gibt.

translation.en: If we're just gonna go round and round in circles,
translation.de: Wenn wir eh nur im Kreis laufen,

translation.en: I'll feel a lot better saying what we all know.
translation.de: sage ich lieber, was wir alle wissen.

translation.en: Are you forgetting the detail that he completely abandoned you?
translation.de: Hast du vergessen, dass er dich verlassen hat?

translation.en: That he totally threw you away?
That he wanted you to abort your own baby?
translation.de: Er wollte, dass du dein Baby abtreibst.

translation.en: -I just wanted... -You just wanted to what?
I need water. I need a place to sleep.
What I don't need is any more brotherly love.
translation.de: Ich brauche nicht noch mehr brüderliche Liebe.

translation.en: But that's not the real reason you don't like me.
translation.de: Aber nicht deswegen hast du was gegen mich.

translation.en: No, it's a good excuse, but it's not the reason.
translation.de: Nein, es ist eine gute Ausrede, aber nicht der Grund.

translation.en: You didn't want me around even before there was a baby.
translation.de: Du wolltest mich vor dem Baby schon loswerden.

translation.en: The truth is, there's nothing that I could have done to make you like me,
translation.de: Es gibt nichts, das ich hätte tun können, damit du mich magst,

translation.en: because no one is ever gonna be good enough for your little sister.
translation.de: weil keiner je gut genug für dein Schwesterchen ist.

translation.en: -A high school diploma would be nice. -You know what?
I'm not quite the fuckup that you think I am!
translation.de: Ich bin nicht so schlimm, wie du denkst.

translation.en: Oh, no. No, no. You're a real rock star.
translation.de: Oh, nein. Du bist ein wahrer Rockstar.

translation.en: You've sacrificed everything for that ridiculous, infantile fantasy,
translation.de: Du hast alles für diese absurde, kindische Fantasie geopfert,

translation.en: and now we're all suffering for it.
Playing hubby to your little sister?
translation.de: Spielst den Mann für deine Schwester?

translation.en: That's the next best thing to fucking her, which is what you really want, isn't it?
translation.de: Fast so gut, wie sie zu ficken, was du wirklich willst, oder?
Die Erlösung steht vor der Tür.

translation.en: He's not gonna get through that without a sledgehammer.
I wouldn't be so sure about that.
translation.de: Da wäre ich nicht so sicher.

translation.en: What are we gonna do? We're stuck up here!
No, listen to me. When I drove here, I saw this building from the road.
translation.de: Auf dem Weg hierher sah ich dieses Gebäude von der Straße.

translation.en: Yeah. The church, it was just on the other side.
translation.de: Ja. Die Kirche war gleich gegenüber.

translation.en: Only thing is, we go in that grass again and we're back to square one.
translation.de: Aber wenn wir ins Gras gehen, sind wir wieder am Anfang.

translation.en: Fucking dog gives me the creeps.
The way out? You think that's it?
translation.de: Glaubst du, das ist der Ausweg?

translation.en: Maybe. But we're not there yet--
translation.de: Mag sein. Aber wir sind noch nicht am Ziel.

translation.en: Becky, we've gotta get out of here.
Holes are everywhere, Calvin, my boy.
I'll come back for him, but we have to get you out!
translation.de: Ich hole ihn noch, erst musst du raus!

translation.en: I found a way. It's... It's right there.
translation.de: Ich habe den Weg gefunden. Da drüben.

translation.en: Beck, I'm your brother, and I'm telling you right now to forget about that asshole.
translation.de: Beck, ich bin dein Bruder, und ich sage dir, vergiss das Arschloch!

translation.en: Thought that you would lose your sister when you got out of here.
translation.de: Du dachtest, du verlierst sie, wenn du rauskommst.

translation.en: That the baby would bring her and Travis together, you'd be left out in the cold.
translation.de: Dass das Baby sie und Travis vereint und sie dich vergisst.

translation.en: You're probably right on that score.
Your mistake is thinking you're ever leaving.
translation.de: Nur, dass du niemals hier rauskommst.

translation.en: Of course, I was a bit of a track star back in the day.
translation.de: Ich war mal ein ziemlich guter Läufer.

translation.en: -[screams] -[grunts] I know. I know. I know.
You're thinking if you had just turned left instead of right,
translation.de: Du denkst, wärst du bloß links anstatt rechts abgebogen,

translation.en: you could've gotten away from me.
And you kept running and didn't turn at all.
in the garden of forking paths,
you didn't make any one choice.
translation.de: trafst du nicht nur eine Wahl.

translation.en: And they all led back to me.
I think he loves you a little too much.
translation.de: Er liebt dich wohl etwas zu sehr.

translation.en: I had my chance with you, and I threw it away.
translation.de: Ich habe meine Chance mit dir verspielt.

translation.en: I want you to know I...
I'm glad you didn't listen to me.
There's something I didn't tell you.
I was gonna give her up.
I didn't think I was ready to be a mom.
translation.de: Ich dachte, ich sei nicht bereit.

translation.en: That's why we were, um, going to San Diego.
translation.de: Deshalb fuhren wir nach San Diego.

translation.en: What difference does it make now?
translation.de: Was spielt das noch für eine Rolle?

translation.en: We're gonna get out of here.
I'm gonna find a way. Our baby deserves to live.
translation.de: Ich finde einen Weg. Unser Baby wird leben.

translation.en: I wish I could just touch your hand.
translation.de: Ich würde gern deine Hand halten.

translation.en: How funny. This is where I tussled with Natalie for the first time.
translation.de: Lustig, hier habe ich mich das erste Mal mit Natalie gerauft.

translation.en: I tried to show her the way, but she just wouldn't listen.
translation.de: Ich wollte ihr den Weg zeigen, aber sie hörte nicht zu.

translation.en: You wanna touch the rock, darlin'?
translation.de: Willst du den Fels berühren, Schatz?

translation.en: You wanna lay on it naked?

translation.de: Willst du mich in dir spüren?

translation.en: Beneath the pinwheel stars while the grass sings our names?
translation.de: Unter dem Sternenhimmel, während das Gras unsere Namen singt?

translation.en: but tears are better for an old, thirsty rock like that.
translation.de: aber Tränen sind besser für einen solch durstigen, alten Fels.

translation.en: -It has to be quick, though. -[thunder rumbling]
Don't wanna do it in front of the kid.
translation.de: Ich will es nicht vor dem Kind tun.

translation.en: Or else we're gonna keep making the same mistakes forever.
translation.de: Sonst machen wir denselben Fehler immer wieder.

translation.en: -No, not too fast. -[gulps] I don't want you to get sick.
translation.de: Nicht so schnell, sonst wird dir noch schlecht.

translation.en: -May I have a look? My baby? -It's okay.
Out of the oven and baked just right.
translation.de: Frisch aus dem Ofen und perfekt gebacken.
Du bist wie die Mutter Maria.

translation.en: Wonder when the Wise Men will come.
translation.de: Wann wohl die drei Weisen aufkreuzen?

translation.en: I wonder what gifts they'll have for us.
translation.de: Und welche Geschenke sie uns bringen?

translation.en: [Cal] There once was a farmer from Leeds
Who swallowed a bag full of seeds
translation.de: das machte er auch auf Dauer.

translation.en: Cows do it all the time.

translation.de: Mein Daddy hat das Baby getötet.

translation.en: He's gonna keep killing us over...
translation.de: Er wird uns immer wieder töten,

translation.en: I'm not gonna let him hurt you.
translation.de: Ich lasse nicht zu, dass er dir wehtut.

translation.en: But he's watching us right now.
translation.de: Aber er beobachtet uns jetzt gerade.

translation.en: I don't see. Your honey took my eye out.
translation.de: Ich sehe nicht. Sie stach mir das Auge aus.

translation.en: Too bad, kid. I liked ya.
Saw a seed of myself in there.
translation.de: Ich dachte, du wärst mir ähnlich.

translation.en: was to help you find redemption.
God knows you're the one who needed it the most.
translation.de: Gott weiß, du brauchtest sie am meisten.
Ich komme nicht noch mal zurück!

translation.en: Sounds like he's really in trouble.
I've been trying to get to the road, -but I can't find it! -[sighs]
translation.de: Ich finde nicht zur Straße zurück!

translation.en: Okay. We better haul him out.
translation.de: Na schön. Holen wir ihn raus.

translation.en: Stay away from it. Stay away.
Get back in the car. You have to go.
-Kid, where are your parents? -It doesn't matter. Please.
-We just have to go. Get in the car. -Okay.
-[Tobin] I can't find my way out! -What do we do?
I mean, it sure sounds like he's in trouble.
translation.de: Es hört sich wirklich ernst an.

translation.en: No. No! No, don't let him go in!
If he goes in, you'll go in and you'll never get out.
translation.de: Wenn er reingeht, folgst du ihm, und ihr kommt niemals raus.

translation.en: He said he got this from Travis.
translation.de: Er sagt, er hätte es von Travis.

translation.en: But right now, we have to go. Please.
translation.de: Aber erst müssen wir weg. Bitte.

translation.en: You've gotta help me get out of here!
-That's back the way we came. -Yeah, I know.
I thought we said we were gonna go on.
What about that family in San Diego?
translation.de: Und die Familie in San Diego?

translation.en: I have my own family now.
translation.de: Ich habe nun meine eigene Familie.

translation.en: ♪ By the way she wears her apron ♪ ♪ And the clothes she wore ♪
